Can we make this just:

std::string msg = instructions[pc].debug_location->wrapErrorMessage(e.what(), "operation failed in interpreter);
if(dynamic_cast<JITException*>(&e) {
  throw JITException(msg);
} else {
  throw std::runtime_error(msg);
}

It is much simpler, and doesn't have bunch of rethrow logic that occurs across different files.
